law.catch_line: Authorization for local public agency to adopt KRS 45A.740, 45A.745, and 45A.750 -- Effect of adoption -- Qualification statements.

text.section:
In the procurement of architectural and engineering services, each local public agency may adopt the provisions of KRS 45A.740, 45A.745, and 45A.750. Upon adoption of these provisions, each local public agency shall:
Establish a monetary limit; and
Use the process set out in KRS 45A.740, 45A.745, and 45A.750 to procure architectural or engineering services for projects whose costs exceed this limit.

If any agency adopts the provisions of KRS 45A.740, 45A.745, and 45A.750, then it shall accept qualification statements from firms engaged in the lawful practice of their professions. These qualification statements shall remain on file for one (1) year from the date they are submitted.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992.
